### Purpose
This script aggregates the dashboard data from individual variables in to a single 
file that the the dashboard uses for plotting.

```{r}
#| include: false
### Load libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

```{r}
#| include: false
# Set report year (RptYr), to make things easier
RptYr <- 2022
```

```{r}
#| include: false
# Load files
# CO2 <- 
# pH <- 
# ENSO <- 
# PDO <- 
# TatD <- 
SST <- read_csv(here('Indicator_Dashboard', paste('SST_Dashboard_Data_', RptYr, '.csv', sep = ""))) 
Chl <- read_csv(here('Indicator_Dashboard',paste('Chl_Dashboard_Data_', RptYr, '.csv', sep = "")))
# MD50 <- 

# Aggregate files
Dashboard_Data <- bind_rows(SST,
                            Chl)

# Save file
write_csv(Dashboard_Data, file = here("Indicator_Dashboard", paste('Dashboard_Data_', RptYr, '.csv', sep = "")))
```
